content: a gentle companion for your everyday shopping the vanilla market bag blends simple stitches with timeless charm it is perfect for weekend markets library visits or carrying fresh blooms home sturdy soft and beautifully practical it s the kind of knit that slips quietly into your life and stays free pattern on my youtube watch it here 1 **sizing** circumference 24 / 61 cm bag length 12 in / 30 5 cm handle length 12 in / 30 5 cm **gauge needles notions** gauge 15 stitches and 15 row = 10 cm in dws pattern needles us 8 - 5 mm straight or 32 - 80 cm circular needles and dpns notions 1 bor tapestry needle **yarn** sport weight i used hobbii rainbow bamboo 273 yds / 250 m - 3 53 oz / 100 g - 60% manufactured fibers - rayon from bamboo - 40% cotton yardage approx 156 yds / 143 m **sharing** posting on instagram use the hashtags #vanillamarketbag be sure to tag @ariannafrasca82 too 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=qfxxmjz88pw
